org.encog.examples.neural.bam
Class BidirectionalAssociativeMemory

java.lang.Object
  org.encog.examples.neural.bam.BidirectionalAssociativeMemory

public class BidirectionalAssociativeMemory
extends Object

Simple class to recognize some patterns with a Bidirectional Associative Memory (BAM) Neural Network. This is very loosely based on a an example by Karsten Kutza, written in C on 1996-01-24. http://www.neural-networks-at-your-fingertips.com/bam.html I translated it to Java and adapted it to use Encog for neural network processing. I mainly kept the patterns from the original example.
